Html:
I want to deploy Acrobat to Windows 7 PC's only (ie not Server 2008)

I am using

<bar:WindowsVersion Comparison="EqualTo" MajorVersion="6" MinorVersion="1" ProductType="1"/>

Is my understanding that the ProductType1 = Workstations correct
Yes, you can use 'ProductType="1"' to detect workstations.
